summary: "Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales" is a 2017 adventure movie, the fifth in the Pirates series. Captain Jack Sparrow, played by Johnny Depp, seeks the Trident of Poseidon to stop a vengeful ghost pirate, Armando Salazar (Javier Bardem). Jack is joined by old friends and new allies, including young sailor Henry Turner and astronomer Carina Smyth. The film was inspired by the first Pirates movie and faced delays due to script and budget issues. It made a lot of money but got mixed reviews.
title: Pirates of the Caribbean Dead Men Tell No Tales
